title: Frontend Design
description: Suppose you're a designer. You also love to write HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and you create gorgeous user interfaces. If really so, you're going to love these tools a lot.

resources.title: Airtable
resources.description: Accelerate work and unlock potential with powerful apps that connect your data, workflows and teams.

resources.title: AngularJS
resources.description: AngularJS lets you extend HTML vocabulary for your application.

resources.title: Bootstrap
resources.description: Build fast, responsive sites with Bootstrap.

resources.title: Codepen
resources.description: CodePen is a social development environment for front-end designers and developers. Build and deploy a website, show off your work, build test cases to learn and debug, and find inspiration.

resources.title: Codrops
resources.description: Stay up to date with the latest web design and development news and relevant updates from Codrops.

resources.title: CSS: Cascading Style Sheets
resources.description: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML (including XML dialects such as SVG, MathML or XHTML).

resources.title: Eleventy
resources.description: Eleventy, a simpler static site generator. It was created to be a JavaScript alternative to Jekyll. It’s zero-config by default but has flexible configuration options.

resources.title: Foundation
resources.description: The most advanced responsive front-end framework in the world.

resources.title: Gerillass
resources.description: Gerillass is a website development tool built on top of Sass with a set of Sass mixins and functions for frontend developers to generate scalable CSS outputs.

resources.title: Git
resources.description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.

resources.title: Github
resources.description: Where the world builds software.

resources.title: Grunt
resources.description: The JavaScript task runner.

resources.title: Gulp
resources.description: A toolkit to automate & enhance your workflow.

resources.title: Hugo
resources.description: The world’s fastest framework for building websites.

resources.title: HTML5 Boilerplate
resources.description: The web’s most popular front-end template.

resources.title: Ionic
resources.description: Build faster, smarter, and into the future.

resources.title: Jekyll
resources.description: Transform your plain text into static websites and blogs. No more databases, comment moderation, or pesky updates to install—just your content.

resources.title: Markdown Guide
resources.description: The Markdown Guide is a free and open-source reference guide that explains how to use Markdown, the simple and easy-to-use markup language you can use to format virtually any document.

resources.title: Markup Validation Service
resources.description: This validator checks the markup validity of Web documents in HTML, XHTML, SMIL, MathML, etc.

resources.title: Material Design Lite
resources.description: Material Design Lite lets you add a Material Design look and feel to your websites.

resources.title: Modaal
resources.description: An accessible dialog window plugin for all humans.

resources.title: Node.js
resources.description: Node.js® is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

resources.title: Parcel
resources.description: Parcel combines a great out-of-the-box development experience with a scalable architecture that can take your project from just getting started to massive production application.

resources.title: React
resources.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

resources.title: Sass
resources.description: Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.

resources.title: Storybook
resources.description: Storybook is an open source tool for building UI components and pages in isolation. It streamlines UI development, testing, and documentation.

resources.title: Tailwind CSS
resources.description: Rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.

resources.title: Typeform
resources.description: You don't want to make a boring form. And your audience won't answer one. Create a typeform instead—and make everyone happy.

resources.title: TypeScript
resources.description: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

resources.title: Visual Studio Code
resources.description: An open-source code editing tool.

resources.title: Vue.js
resources.description: An approachable, performant and versatile framework for building web user interfaces.
